name: Gourmet Stuffed Chicken Breasts
ingredients: 6 oz. long and wild rice-Uncle Bens
instructions: Add contents of rice packet and onion.
Cook until lightly browned, stirring constantly.
Stir in water, sherry and contents of seasoning packet.
Bring to a boil and cover.
Simmer until all liquid is absorbed, about 25 minutes.
Divide rice mix into 6 mounds in a 12 x 8 dish.
Cover each mound with a breast.
Arrange 2 pieces of bacon over each breast.
Remove foil and continue baking until chicken is tender about 30 minutes.
